name: Bowling Pro 2016 — Ten Pin Multiplayer Strike
name_original: Bowling Pro 2016 — Ten Pin Multiplayer Strike
description:
*** Half price for a very limited time ***
Finally a realistic high-quality bowling game for Apple TV! Bowling Pro 2016 combines super-slick graphics and intuitive ball control with fun, realistic gameplay. Play with up to four friends or challenge yourself to the reach the magical 300.

Bowling Pro 2016 allows for all the bowling tricks and moves. With simple controls and realistic spin, velocity and positioning you can master all the techniques, from hooks to bounces.

Have fun!
